title: User Login Success with Valid Credentials
description: Verify that a user can successfully login using valid credentials and maintain session across pages.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page
Enter valid username/email and password
Click the login button
Verify successful login and redirection to the dashboard
Navigate to another authenticated page
Verify that the user session persists and page loads correctly without requiring login

title: User Login Failure with Invalid Credentials
description: Verify login failure when incorrect username/email or password is provided.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page
Enter invalid username/email and password
Click the login button
Verify login is rejected and informative error message is displayed

title: Dashboard Displays Correct Real-time Financial Metrics
description: Ensure the dashboard shows accurate real-time revenue, expenses, cash balances and business metrics consistent with transactions.

steps.description: Login and navigate to the dashboard page
Verify that revenue charts and client concentration analytics are displayed
Validate that revenue, expenses and cash balances match backend transaction data
Verify business metrics update in real-time when new transactions are added

title: Invoice Creation and PDF Generation
description: Validate the complete invoice creation workflow and ensure invoices can be exported as correctly formatted PDFs including ETA e-invoicing support.

steps.description: Login and navigate to invoice creation page
Select a client and add multiple line items with quantities, prices, and taxes
Generate the invoice and export it as a PDF
Verify PDF invoice is correctly formatted and contains all necessary details
Verify ETA e-invoicing data is correctly included when applicable
Verify partial and overdue payments reflect correctly on the invoice

title: Inventory Stock Level Updates With Movements
description: Validate stock levels update accurately with product movement operations and low stock alerts trigger properly.

steps.description: Login and navigate to inventory management page
Add a new product with SKU and barcode
Create stock movements: add stock to warehouse, transfer between warehouses, and issue stock for sale
Verify updated stock levels reflect accurately in all related warehouses
Reduce stock to below low stock threshold
Verify that a low stock alert notification is triggered

title: POS Transaction Processing With Barcode Scanning and Shift Management
description: Ensure POS transactions are processed accurately including product scanning, cart management, discount application, tax handling, and cashier shift reconciliation.

steps.description: Login as cashier and open POS interface
Scan products using barcode and add them to cart
Apply discounts and taxes as applicable
Process payment to complete sale
Verify transaction is recorded correctly with correct amounts and tax calculations
Begin and end a cashier shift
Verify shift reconciliation reports and sales records match POS transactions

title: Double-entry Accounting Journal Entry Creation and Validation
description: Verify that accounting journal entries enforce double-entry rules and balance, and are correctly reflected in financial statements and trial balance reports.

steps.description: Login and access journal entries section
Create a new journal entry with debit and credit lines ensuring total debits equal total credits
Verify the journal entry is accepted and saved
Attempt to create unbalanced journal entry
Verify system rejects unbalanced entry with proper error
Generate and review trial balance report
Verify journal entries appear and balances match debits and credits

title: Multi-user Role Permissions Enforcement
description: Validate access control by ensuring user roles (Admin, Cashier, Accountant) are restricted to authorized features and settings.

steps.description: Login as Admin user
Verify access to all features including user and company management
Login as Cashier user
Verify access restricted to POS and sales features only, no access to accounting or user management
Login as Accountant user
Verify access to accounting journals, financial reports but no access to POS or user management

title: Subscription Activation and Billing via Stripe
description: Verify subscription plans activate correctly through Stripe integration and billing transactions reconcile accurately.

steps.description: Login and navigate to subscription management page
Select a subscription plan and initiate payment via Stripe
Verify subscription status updates to active after successful payment
Verify that billing transactions are correctly recorded and reflected in account statements
Attempt payment failure scenario
Verify informative error messages presented and subscription remains inactive

title: Audit Trail Logging for User and System Actions
description: Ensure audit logs reliably record all significant user activities and system events for compliance and traceability.

steps.description: Perform key actions such as login, invoice creation, journal entry, and user role changes
Access audit trail review page
Verify each performed action is logged with correct timestamp, user details, and action description
Verify filtering and search for audit logs works correctly

title: Bilingual Interface Switch Between English and Arabic with RTL Layout
description: Verify that switching the language dynamically updates all UI texts and switches between LTR for English and RTL layout for Arabic correctly.

steps.description: Login and navigate to dashboard
Switch application language to Arabic
Verify all UI text is displayed in Arabic
Verify UI layout switches to right-to-left orientation
Switch back to English
Verify UI text is in English and layout is left-to-right

title: New User Onboarding and Company Setup Workflow
description: Validate the smooth onboarding flow for new users creating company information and preferences.

steps.description: Register a new user and login for the first time
Follow onboarding steps to input company information such as name, address, tax details
Set user preferences including language and currency
Verify progress through onboarding steps without errors
Verify onboarding completion leads to access to main dashboard

title: Financial Reports Generation and Accuracy
description: Ensure financial statements and reports generate correctly with data consistent with transactions and journal entries.

steps.description: Login and navigate to financial reports section
Generate key reports: Profit & Loss, Balance Sheet, Cash Flow
Verify reports display complete data consistent with prior invoices, expenses, and journal entries
Validate formatting and calculation correctness within reports

title: Team Management User Addition and Role Assignment
description: Verify that Admin can add new users, assign roles and set company memberships with correct access rights.

steps.description: Login as Admin and navigate to team management section
Add a new user by email and assign a role (Admin, Cashier, Accountant)
Verify the new user receives correct access rights corresponding to their assigned role
Attempt role change and company membership modification
Verify updates are saved and access rights updated accordingly
